briefTitle: Study to Evaluate the Effect of FX006 on Synovial Inflammation in Patients With OA of the Knee
officialTitle: An Open-Label Study to Evaluate the Effect of the Administration of FX006 on Synovial Inflammation in Patients With Osteoarthritis of the Knee
summary: This is an open-label study assessing the effect of the administration of a single intra-articular (IA) injection of FX006 32 mg on synovial volume in patients with osteoarthritis (OA) of the knee.

primaryOutcome.measure: Mean Standardized Change in Synovial Volume (SV) at 6 Weeks
